None.Name: Use It Well
None.Description: Every 2.5 seconds, unit is able to cast a regenerative spell upon friendly units that lasts for 10 seconds and restores 26 life points per second, up to 260 in total. On each target unit the spell may only be applied once at a time.

None.Name: Regeneration
None.Description: Unit constantly regenerates 30 life points per second.
